state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled tomato plant. -= Bedroom =- You find yourself in a bedroom. An usual kind of place. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a chest drawer. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's an antique trunk. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting. You can see a king-size bed. The king-size bed is typical. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
